name: Galaxy War Drake
desc: If a Level 4 LIGHT monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can target 1 other Level 4 LIGHT monster you control; the Levels of both that monster and this card become 8 until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Galaxy War Drake" once per turn, also you cannot Special Summon the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except LIGHT monsters.
